definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
non-Han people, esp. to the East of China/barbarians/to wipe out/to exterminate/to tear down/to raze

pinyin: Xia4 wei1 yi2 Huo3 shan1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

sentences.english: My high school was Punahou School in Honolulu, Hawai'i.
sentences.chinese: 我高中是在夏威夷州火奴魯魯市普納荷學校讀的。

sentences.english: A shirt that says "Hawaii is beautiful".
sentences.chinese: 一種上面印着“夏威夷真美麗”的襯衫。

sentences.english: After lunch , the group will visit macadamia nuts farm , rainbow falls and an orchid garden.
sentences.chinese: 下午參觀夏威夷農場蘭花園和彩虹瀑布。

sentences.english: Even the kneecaps—no larger than macadamia nuts—are preserved.
sentences.chinese: 連不比夏威夷堅果大的膝蓋骨，也保存下來了。

sentences.english: A Hawaiian green sea turtle swims in just a few feet of water.
sentences.chinese: 一隻夏威夷綠海龜在幾英尺水下游泳。

sentences.english: Did your father go to Hawaii by sea or by air?
sentences.chinese: 你父親去夏威夷是搭船還是搭飛機？

sentences.english: Another is his birthplace - some of the president's detractors question the veracity of Mr. Obama's Hawaiian birth certificate.
sentences.chinese: 一些詆譭者對他夏威夷出生證的真實性提出了質疑。
夏威夷吸引了許多旅遊者。

sentences.english: After the war, two-thirds of the people of Hawaii supported statehood.
sentences.chinese: 戰後，夏威夷三分之二人贊同獲得美國州的地位。

sentences.english: It will be located on top of Mauna Kea, Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 它將會放置在夏威夷莫納克亞山的頂點。

sentences.english: President-elect Obama is in Hawaii, where he was born and raised.
sentences.chinese: 當選總統奧巴馬則在夏威夷，他生長的地方。

sentences.english: "It's a native Hawaiian favorite," Leatherman said.
sentences.chinese: “它是夏威夷當地人的愛好，”萊特曼說。

sentences.english: We went to Hawaii to enjoy the amenity of a warm climate.
sentences.chinese: 我們去了夏威夷，享受到了舒適宜人的溫暖氣候。

sentences.english: Croquet first played in Hawaii at Punahou School in Honolulu.
sentences.chinese: 槌球首次傳入夏威夷火奴魯魯的帕納胡學校。

sentences.english: I went to Hawaii for a week to decompress.
sentences.chinese: 爲了消除緊張的情緒，我去夏威夷玩了一星期。

sentences.english: Hawaii's famed white sandy beaches are shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷著名白沙灘正在萎縮。

definition: Fiji, country in the southwest Pacific Ocean
Honolulu, capital of Hawaii/also transliterated as 火奴魯魯|火奴鲁鲁
Honolulu, capital of Hawaii/also called 檀香山

pinyin: Ma3 li3 ya4 na4 Qun2 dao3

definition: Republic of Palau or Belau (Pacific island nation)
